nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, Anakin Skywalker, Ahsoka Tano, and Obi-Wan Kenobi undertook an undercover mission to Zygerria to rescue the Togrutan population of the planet Kiros from Zygerrian slavers. Although the initial infiltration was successful, their mission on Zygerria with the Jedi being defeated, with Kenobi and Clone Captain Rex being captured and forced into slavery at the Kadavo slave processing facility.
